title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 96 - Residential Electric Submetering

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. § 96.1 - Definitions
